# Priklad
$T = 20s$ \
$y_m = 0,1m$ \
$\omega = \frac{2 \pi}{T}$ \
$y = y_m \cdot \cos(\omega t)$ \
$y = 0.1 \cdot \sin(0.1 \pi t)$ \
$v = \omega \cdot y_m \cos(\omega t)$ \
$v = 0.1 \pi \cdot y_m \cos(0.1 \pi t)$ \
$v = 0.01 \pi \cdot \cos(0.1 \pi t)$ \
$a = - \omega^2 y$ \
$a = - 0.001 \pi^2 \sin(0.1 \pi t)$ \
$\Phi = 0.1 \pi t = 0.1 \cdot 180 \cdot 12$ \
